示例

- `leaflet`地图效果

```{r example-leaflet, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(widgetframe)
l <- leaflet() %>% addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>% setView(0,0,2)
frameWidget(l)
```
